amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No 41 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1997 to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill for development assistance for use to directly support or promote big game trophy hunting or the commercial trade in elephant ivory, hides or rhinoceros horns.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 267, 1 Present (Roll no. 359).
